title: Vaccinated Mainers should be prepared to wear masks indoors again, top state health official says
content:
1. Vaccinated Mainers should be prepared to wear masks indoors again, top state health official says  Bangor Daily News
  2. These fully vaccinated Americans got breakthrough infections. They say it could have been worse without being vaccinated  CNN
  3. Maine CDC reports 175 new COVID-19 cases, 1 death  WABI
  4. Masking expected to return in Maine, as new COVID-19 cases increase  Kennebec Journal and Morning Sentinel
  5. 2 Maine counties fall under CDC's new indoor mask recommendations  WMTW Portland
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ワクチンを接種したメイン州民は、室内で再びマスクを着用する準備をすべきであると、州の保健当局トップが発表。
州卫生局高级官员说，接种疫苗的美因茨人应准备好再次在室内戴口罩
州衛生局高級官員說，接種疫苗的美因茨人應準備好再次在室內戴口罩
